note:
Writer, crafter, costumier, patchworker, hermit. I have a historical textile obsession, enjoy bad robots, Yog-Sothoth, and all flavours of undead, and am very much older than 21. Content will include profanity. She/they.

I write SFF/horror and other cross genre fiction, plus non-fiction too. Got a doctorate in History of Art and am learning German.

Profile pic is a quilt I made. Banner image is the cat that goes to Ryedale Folk Museum and I love him.
